summary:
## The 2006 Lebanon War: A Simple Summary

In 2006, a big fight happened between Israel and a Lebanese group called Hezbollah. It started when Hezbollah attacked Israel, killing and capturing some soldiers. Israel got mad and attacked back, hitting both Hezbollah targets and Lebanese cities.

Lots of people died, and many had to leave their homes. After a month, the United Nations helped stop the fighting. But Hezbollah still kept its weapons, and both sides said they won.
title: 2006 Lebanon War
